code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TrainModel=()=>{const[iters,setIters]=useState(600000);const[learningRate,setLearningRate]=useState(6e-4);const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/train',{iters,learning_rate:learningRate});setStatus(response.data.status);setError('');}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);setStatus('Error starting training');setError(error.response?error.response.data.error:'Unknown error');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Train Model"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This model is trained on Shakespeare's text dataset."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:iters,onChange:e=>setIters(e.target.value),placeholder:"Number of iterations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:learningRate,onChange:e=>setLearningRate(e.target.value),placeholder:"Learning rate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Train"})]}),status&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:status}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error})]});};export default TrainModel;
